document.discussion_title: Torc Oil And Gas Ltd (TSE:TOG) Receives C$8.61 Average PT from Brokerages
document.topic_text: Tweet Torc Oil And Gas Ltd (TSE:TOG) has been given a consensus rating of “Buy” by the thirteen ratings firms that are covering the firm. One equities research analyst has rated the stock with a hold rating and nine have issued a buy rating on the company. The average 1-year target price among brokers that have issued a report on the stock in the last year is C$8.61. Torc Oil And Gas ( TSE:TOG ) opened at 8.40 on Friday. The stock’s 50 day moving average is $7.73 and its 200 day moving average is $7.58. Torc Oil And Gas has a one year low of $3.71 and a one year high of $9.23. The stock’s market capitalization is $1.37 billion. TOG has been the topic of a number of research analyst reports. Canaccord Genuity lowered their price target on Torc Oil And Gas from C$10.00 to C$9.00 in a report on Monday, May 2nd. TD Securities reissued a “buy” rating and set a C$10.50 price target on shares of Torc Oil And Gas in a report on Wednesday, August 17th. Dundee Securities lowered Torc Oil And Gas from a “buy” rating to a “neutral” rating in a report on Tuesday, August 9th. Scotiabank lowered their price target on Torc Oil And Gas from C$10.25 to C$9.75 and set an “outperform” rating on the stock in a report on Wednesday, August 17th. Finally, Royal Bank Of Canada raised their price target on Torc Oil And Gas from C$9.00 to C$10.00 and gave the company an “outperform” rating in a report on Thursday, May 12th. In related news, insider Michael Wihak sold 15,000 shares of Torc Oil And Gas stock in a transaction dated Tuesday, June 7th. The stock was sold at an average price of C$8.81, for a total value of C$132,150.00. TORC Oil and Gas Ltd. (TORC), formerly Vero Energy Inc (Vero), is a Canada-based company. The Company is engaged in the acquisition, exploration, development and production of crude oil and natural gas assets.The Company is engaged in drilling activities. TORC uses its technical, technological and industry knowledge to evaluate potential hydrocarbon . Torc Oil And Gas Ltd Torc Oil And Gas Ltd
